channel.title: My updates arent working. n e idea y? will rep if help
channel.description:
i have a question. i got all the updates i want done but do i need to have server logged off when i wanna save the coding i just did?
cause even when my server is off i go to ""save as" i save it then i open compile and then runserver. is that what im supposed to do? caus ei t aint working.
plz help[br][size=1]Posted at: December 03, 2006, 04:24:21 PM[/size][hr]please help me

item.title: My updates arent working. n e idea y? will rep if help
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

ownt(PkerScape owner):

tell me how to fix em?

Post what the errors that come up, but if this comes up:

[quote=“mrrules, post:21, topic:31935”]I laughed…Save what you did to the client.java (which is the noted pad that says client that you opened) Ok double click a thing that say’s compile it will come up with a black box will say

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:3333
Then exit that black box and click runserver and let that run and you log on.[/quote]

Then you need to restrat your server and try again with the logging on. If you are POSITIVE it is showing that message ^, and that your Java file is SAVED BEFORE THE COMPILE, AND that when you restart the server it STILL does not work…, then somthing is wrong with the code itself. Most likely a bug is going on in the code and the best thing to do is re-phrase the code in new statements or debugg the code that is not functioning correctly.

Read full topic

SAVE CLIENT
CLICK COMPILE (MUST WAIT FOR IT TO COMPILE FINISHED!)
CLICK RUNSERVER

OKAY???

item.title: My updates arent working. n e idea y? will rep if help
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

ok erm…let me try to translate…what i think your asking is that is you can save you changes you made to the files in your folder when your server is running and how to use compile

yes you can but to make it working in-game you have to click compile.

and when you click compile dont click edit, click run instead

and when you click “save as” you save it to the file that you edited, for exaple if you added a code to your client.java then you save it to client.java

Read full topic

item.title: My updates arent working. n e idea y? will rep if help
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Argon Blood_Argon
item.description:
@Blood_Argon wrote:

Saved Client.Java, Close your server, Run Compile, Run Server…
Important, do it in that order or your computer will spew out acid, turnips, and chuck norris, then run away like a trouble child on crack…

Happened to me, about 7 times.

Read full topic
